General.Name: Silverline Endustri ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Silverline Endustri ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells hoods, ovens, built-in hobs, built-in dishwashers, washing machines, and refrigerators. It also produces a range of accessories, such as external motors, and curved and standard remote controls. The company was formerly known as Gumusfon Metal Endustri ve Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Silverline Endustri ve Ticaret A.S. in 2005. Silverline Endustri ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

1.Name: Mr. Mehmet Ilhan Atay
